description: Application for Non-Material Amendment of planning permission ref: PA/21/02183, dated 01/04/2022.Non-Material Amendment(s) Sought:Minor amendments to the ground floor shop front 3D concrete piers to slightly rationalise design. Material and glazing details remain the same. Fourth floor windows were altered to align with steel columns. Window details remain as per approved. Infill finish (render) to match the existing. Window setting out to match existing and align with the steel columns. Roof insulation has been added on the left side. Finishes to match the existing. Rear elevation fourth floor window to be removed and opening blocked up. New finishes to match the existing adjacent. Elevation CC windows setting out amended to suit internal layout.Amended external stairs to Unit C. Ground floor external wall to retail unit angle altered due to Structural Engineer recommendations to be supported by the existing beam.New paving stone finish to courtyard.
